changelogs.prelude: May be useful sometimes.. like a text above the actual change list

change_list.title: Brand new editor view ARISES!
change_list.description: Take advantage of the new post content editor to post like you never before. (hint: it can emoji)

change_list.title: Uploads!
change_list.description: Yes, it's true, you can now upload files. Small files, big files. It's really up to you.

change_list.title: Postal manipulation.
change_list.description: Edit or delete your posts, if you dare.

change_list.title: Quotes: year 2018.
change_list.description: You can quote from multiple pages. We did this too, just because.

change_list.title: Tweak it.
change_list.description: Settings are now available, in case you want to change your notification sound.

change_list.title: OMG this is a long changelog!!
change_list.description: Well get used to it, we have ultra cool changelogs now!

change_list.title: Unread posts missing.
change_list.description: Know how you could only see the first page of your unread messages? Not anymore!

change_list.title: Many bugs.
change_list.description: We fixed a ton of other bugs, so the app is now like 36.2% more bug free.

change_list.title: Much cutter icons in boards.
change_list.description: Sticky icon changed to much the overall greatness of the forum, also a dot was added. Don't you just love dots?

change_list.title: Post actions overflow.
change_list.description: We noticed how post cards were getting cramped up by all the quote buttons and whatnot, so we moved some to an overflow.

change_list.title: Vectors once again.
change_list.description: All icons are now in vector format. No zoom is scary in this parts!

change_list.title: Reporting.
change_list.description: Long overdue job was done in the reporting class. We shall now have an easier time fixing bothering bugs.

change_list.title: No WI-FI, no topic.
change_list.description: Added a message on topics that warns when no connection is available.

change_list.title: Get mentioned.
change_list.description: A yellow border is added to posts that quote you. It's beautiful!

change_list.title: The inner update.
change_list.description: Updated the libraries used. So expect 4% better behavior.

change_list.title: You made it!
change_list.description: Congrats, this is the end.. of the changelog! Have a cookie 🍪
